item.description:
We need the Photoshop and Lightroom experts to come and show us how to retouch images. 

Members should bring some high resolution jpeg images (studio, glamour & fashion images please) on USB flash drives so that the retouching experts can do live demonstrations. The experts are your fellow meetup members.

I'll set up my computer and project onto a wall and everyone else can follow along.  It will be interesting to watch how different retouching styles will be applied to the same image.

Bring your laptop, your fold up chair, and power strip so we can plug you in. We also have free wifi.

It's Ok to bring images that show nudity. We'll put images up anonymously so that critiques can be harsh and cruel, lol, just kidding. Everyone should be courteous and civil.

 

We will collect $5 from everyone to cover snacks and studio rental.

 

Note: We are working out the details for the next evening's program (Nov 29) at Adobe in Waltham where there will be more Photoshop and Lightroom demonstrations by Adobe Specialists.

 

PLEASE REMEMBER TO BRING A CHAIR FOR YOURSELF.
item.name: Retouching with Photoshop and Lightroom
